Bullet woke up in the CR chamber with a severe headache. He remembered his =
"discussion" with Chameleon but very little after that. "I knew I shouldn't=
 have taken that 5th of nebulan fuel" he muttered placing his fingers to hi=
s temples. His pain fealt as if it would break out of his head and travel d=
own his arms. He knew that something bad had happened, he could feal the cr=
 chamber keeping him sedated. He looked around the room "BIG MISTAKE" he th=
ought as the room seemed to spin. He would've tossed his "cookies" (little =
comp. joke) if he had an organic stomach. His adrenaline rush had gone but =
now he had to deal with the hangover that followed.
  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, M=
arch 29, 2001 12:14 PM
  Subject: Re: BlackFortress's Cr


  ::Orchestra::
=
   
      Orchestra nodded, and patted Chameleon on the back.
   
      "Ya=
, let's drink.  Also, tell me some more about what happened between you and=
 the bull, starting from how it all started," Orchestra said.

        Yaho=
o! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject =
to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
